message: I was used to Ubuntu and Win, where to drag a window you should click-n-drag on the title bar. But on Mac you can click-n-drag every where. This cause dragging every time you miss a button...
There's a way to change this behavior?
I think that's a setting in mouse settings. Mine certainly doesn't do that.
I actally think thatt's geat, because it is easyer to move a window.
Think about the browser. You want to click on back button. If you miss, you'll move the window. This sucks for me...
Why would you click and drag if you just meant to click the back button? Too much coffee? :)
It's bit problematic that with new touchpads windows sometimes get stuck to the mouse pointer, other that that everything is fine.
